Class KnockInOutBarrierCallPut

  • Object
    • KnockInOutBarrierCallPut
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FinancialInstrument
    public class KnockInOutBarrierCallPut
extends Object
implements FinancialInstrument
    Class allows for calculation of the payoff of a barrier option.
    Author:
    thesste

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      KnockInOutBarrierCallPut​(double strike, double barrier, String optionType, String barrierType)
      This method constructs a path-dependent barrier option and validates the option and barrier type.

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive​(double[] underlyingPath)
        It is checked whether the barrier option was activated / was not deactivated at maturity.
        Parameters:
        underlyingPath - underlying path
        Returns:
        true if option is (still) active at maturity, false otherwise
